H0.text: which came first the walking dead comic or show. Novel

H1.text: which came first the walking dead comic or show. Video Game

H2.text: which came first the walking dead comic or show. Movie

H3.text: which came first the walking dead comic or show. comic

A4.text: The Walking Dead debuted in 2003, published by Image Comics, with art by Tony Moore for the first six issues and Cliff Rathburn shading the art after issue #5.

A5.text: Telltale Games, an adventure game developer, secured the rights with Kirkman to make an episodic video game inspired by The Walking Dead comic book series in 2011.

A6.text: The Walking Dead premiered on October 31, 2010.

A7.text: The pilot began filming in Atlanta, Georgia, on May 15, 2010.
